item.title: Use Certbot Docker to Manage Certs
item.description: I think everyone knows Let's Encrypt these days. I use letsencrypt for some of my personal services. I was using the system shipped certs at the beginning, and using systemd jobs to auto renew the certs. I was using the HTTP-01 challenge mode at first, and using the certbot standalone mode to achieve that.
